messages.body: $AAPL will save hundreds of billions in the next few years... https://www.cnbc.com/2018/02/22/if-apple-secures-cobalt-supply-for-batteries-it-could-save-billions.html

links.title: Apple could save 'hundreds of billions' of dollars if it makes a metal play
links.description: Apple could potentially save hundreds of billions of dollars over the next two to three years if the tech giant secures cobalt supplies, an analyst told CNBC on Thursday. Daniel Ives, chief strategy officer and head of technology research at GBH Insights, said it makes sense for Apple to try and secure cobalt supply given the rapid increase in the price of the resource over the last year-and-a-half.

links.title: A Cold Analysis On 2017 And A Look Beyond
links.description: The finest trick of the devil is to persuade you that he does not exist Charles Baudelaire I've my own version of this: 'the finest trick of the devil is to persuade you that social sciences exist.' Although my background is economics, during my years in the market, I've loosen up the idea that Economics is a proper science.

links.description: Apple could potentially save hundreds of billions of dollars over the next two to three years if the tech giant secures cobalt supplies, an analyst told CNBC on Thursday. Daniel Ives, chief strategy officer and head of technology research at GBH Insights, said it makes sense for Apple to try and secure cobalt supply given the rapid increase in the price of the resource over the last year-and-a-half.

links.title: Apple files for updated Apple TV trademark potentially hinting at more advanced gaming capabilities
links.description: Apple has apparently updated its Apple TV trademark with new conditions related to gaming. Patently Apple reports today that the company filed an updated trademark last Friday to cover gaming use cases, a move that the site calls "a significant update that has to be taken seriously."
